## FatalErrorsStart type

FatalErrors stop the OpenSearchDashboards Public Core and displays a fatal error screen with details about the OpenSearchDashboards build and the error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FatalErrorsStart = FatalErrorsSetup;
```
